00035 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( TemplateFileReaderTest );
00036 
00037 #define TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE "../data/file_does_not_exist";
00038 #define TEST_DATA_FILE_INVALID "../data/test.file.data_header_only"
00039 #define TEST_DATA_FILE "../data/MIAME.xml"

00049 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00050 {
00051         TemplateFileReader reader;
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00054 
00055 void TemplateFileReaderTest::CheckTemplateData(bool headerOnly)
00056 {
00057         TemplateFileReader reader;
00058         TemplateData temp;
00059         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, temp, headerOnly) == true);
00061 
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( temp.DataTypeIdentifier() == TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER );
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( temp.TemplateFileIdentifier() == std::string("987-987-987"));
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( temp.CreationDateTime() == L"8/12/2005 9:00AM");
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( temp.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00066 
00067         if (headerOnly)
00068                 return;
00069 
00070         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = temp.UserAttributes();
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( userParams.size() == 23 );
00072 
00073         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userIt = userParams.begin();
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Genus" );
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetDefaultValueText() == L"Unknown" );
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == true );
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00079         ++userIt;
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Species" );
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetDefaultValueText() == L"" );
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00085         ++userIt;
00086         ++userIt;
00087         ++userIt;
00088         ++userIt;
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Sex" );
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetDefaultValueText() == L"" );
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 4 );
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlSingleParameterType);
00094         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator cit = (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Male" );
00096         ++cit;
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Female" );
00098         ++cit;
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Unknown" );
00100         ++cit;
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Other" );
00102         ++userIt;
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Age" );
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetDefaultValueText() == L"" );
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read()
00111 {
00112         CheckTemplateData(false);
00113 }
00114 
00115 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_header_data_only()
00116 {
00117         CheckTemplateData(true);
00118 }
00119 
00120 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_when_file_does_not_exist()
00121 {
00122         TemplateFileReader reader;
00123         TemplateData temp;
00124         std::string name = TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE;
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, temp) == false);
00126 }
00127 
00128 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_when_file_is_not_valid()
00129 {
00130         TemplateFileReader reader;
00131         TemplateData temp;
00132         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE_INVALID;
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, temp) == false);
00134 }
00135 
00136 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_IsFileType()
00137 {
00138         std::string file;
00139 
00140         file = TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE;
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(TemplateFileReader::IsFileType(file, TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER) == false);
00142 
00143         file = TEST_DATA_FILE_INVALID;
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(TemplateFileReader::IsFileType(file, TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER) == false);
00145 
00146         file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( TemplateFileReader::IsFileType(file, TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER) == true );
00148 }
00149 
00150 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_DataTypeIdentifierStatic()
00151 {
00152         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00153         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType guid;
00154         guid = TemplateFileReader::DataTypeIdentifier(name);
00155 
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(guid == TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00157 }
